entry.title: Last
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Last

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

We are so grateful for your support of the solidarity meals program ❤️❤️❤️ This is our first time selling burritos to raise money for the emergency fund. Please keep sharing with your communities to help make it a success! You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: * sigue es español * Tonight! Come to the car rally. 5:00pm to...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

* sigue es español *
Tonight! Come to the car rally. 5:00pm to decorate, 5:30 kick- off at the Justice for All Center 2525 W. Alameda Ave. Insist Congress take immediate action for a just, transparent and effective overhaul of our nation's immigration system. #allofus #beyondTemporary #Not1More Deportation. Details https://fb.me/e/dgHlvutVO
****************************
¡Esta noche! Únete a la caravana. 5pm para decorar los autos, 5:30 para irnos - nos vemos en el 2525 W. Almeda Ave. Insiste que el congreso actúe de inmediato para transformar el sistema migratorio a uno que sea justa, humana, transparente y eficaz. #ParaTodos #Ni1Mas Deportación. Detalles >
https://fb.me/e/dgHlvutVO

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co Rather than going toward a particular family, the money fr...om burrito sales will go toward an emergency fund that any family can access in a time of need. While the Biden administration has halted deportations for the first 100 days of their administration, ICE can still detain people, and this emergency fund is essential in ensuring that if someone is detained, there’s money readily available to get them legal representation. The photo is from our recent car rally co-hosted with @co_immigrant @abolishicedenver the American Friends Service Committee & Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition demanding that the Biden administration take further action to keep families together and provide a pathway to permanent legal status for all 11 million undocumented people living in the U.S.

See More

entry.title: It’s our last sale of the month! Two families will be working...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

It’s our last sale of the month! Two families will be working together to make burritos, and the money will go toward an emergency fund, rather than the families cooking. The growth of this fund is incredibly important to the families who lead Sanctuary4All because it provides security in case anyone is unexpectedly detained and needs money quickly for legal representation. You can order a burrito at solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co Rather than going toward a particular family, the money from burrito sales will go toward an emergency fund that any family can access in a time of need. While the Biden administration has halted deportations for the first 100 days of their administration, ICE can still detain people, and this emergency fund is essential in ensuring that if someone is detained, there’s money ...readily available to get them legal representation. The photo is from our recent car rally co-hosted with @co_immigrant @abolishicedenver the American Friends Service Committee & Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition demanding that the Biden administration take further action to keep families together and provide a pathway to permanent legal status for all 11 million undocumented people living in the U.S.
